name: Space Pacer
description:
Glide through space to reach the proper space station using arrows to rotate and speed up, but be mindful of your fuel or you might end up lost in space. Land on any station to refuel and use you [M]ap to see further ahead. Don't forget to get your vision back to [N]ormal later. 

Remember, [SPACE] travel is all about waiting while time passes. So set your course, your speed and beware the celestial bodies and their gravitational pulls.

Get to the right station, pointed by your compass, to get your score up.
